snippet: The departure is the latest upheaval for a televangelist ministry that has seen many of them in recent years.
abstract: Robert Schuller and wife Arvella resign from the board of directors of the Crystal Cathedral, the megachurch and televangelist ministry Schuller founded four decades ago; their resignation is the latest upheaval for the huge, financially struggling church in California's Orange County.
lead_paragraph: The departure is the latest upheaval for a televangelist ministry that has seen many of them in recent years.

headline.seo: Robert Schuller, Crystal Cathedral Founder, Quits Board
headline.main: Crystal Cathedral’s Founder Quits Its Board
headline.print_headline: Crystal Cathedral’s Founder Quits Its Board
